title: Kindergarten - 2nd Grade Basic Reasoning Assessment
description: Basic reasoning and moral development concepts for young learners ages 5-8
author: OMLearn Team

questions.text: If you found a toy that doesn't belong to you, what should you do?
questions.reasoning: This assesses basic understanding of honesty and property rights.

questions.text: How do you feel when someone shares with you?
questions.reasoning: This explores emotional understanding and gratitude.

questions.text: What would you do if you saw someone crying?
questions.reasoning: This assesses empathy and appropriate social responses.

questions.text: If you could have any pet, what would you choose and why?
questions.reasoning: This evaluates basic reasoning and preference articulation.
This explores understanding of friendship and social relationships.
